resources.string: This app was developed as a first semester project of the Software Development bachelor, at the Copenhagen School of Design and Technology.
It implements a RESTful steganography web service.
Due to the nature of steganography, images transmitted with messaging apps that compress attachments, e.g. Facebook\'s Messenger, won\'t contain the hidden message.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. In accumsan, eros vel sollicitudin posuere.
